name: com.gleechi.unity.virtualgrasp
description: VirtualGrasp is the premier interaction engine for VR and Unity, built upon a foundation of years of award-winning robotics research.

samples.description: Contains an onboarding scene and tutorials to get started with the VirtualGrasp SDK.
Contains a sample scene that compares Oculus OVRHand controller with VG OculusHand controller. Note: you need to install Oculus Integration from the Unity Asset Store to resolve missing Prefabs.
